description.PATH_COVERAGE: Every path defined in the OpenAPI specification has been called. This is a subset of `HTTP_METHOD_COVERAGE`.
description.HTTP_METHOD_COVERAGE: Each HTTP method (`GET`, `POST`, `PUT`, `DELETE`, etc.) for each path has been tested.
description.ERROR_RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE: Each documented error response code for each endpoint is tested. This is a subset of `RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE`.
description.RESPONSE_CODE_COVERAGE: Each documented response code for each endpoint is tested.
description.REQUIRED_PARAMETER_COVERAGE: Each required parameter (in path, query) has been tested with valid values. This is a subset of `PARAMETER_COVERAGE`.
description.PARAMETER_COVERAGE: Each parameter (in path, query) has been tested with valid values.
description.REQUIRED_ERROR_FIELDS: Error responses include all required fields.
description.ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED: All response codes (including errors) that occurred must be documented in the OpenAPI specification.
description.ALL_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED: All error response codes that occurred must be documented in the OpenAPI specification. This is a subset of `ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED`.
description.ALL_NON_ERROR_CODES_DOCUMENTED: All response codes that occurred and are not being considered errors (0 - 399) must be documented in the OpenAPI specification. This is a subset of `ALL_RESPONSE_CODES_DOCUMENTED`.
